entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
